author: MSNBC
title: Kansas governor calls for education leader to resign over ‘raiding’ remark
description: Gov. Laura Kelly and indigenous leaders on Thursday called on Kansas’ top public school administrator to resign over an offensive public remark about Native Americans.
content:
TOPEKA, Kan. Gov. Laura Kelly and indigenous leaders on Thursday called on Kansas top public school administrator to resign over an offensive public remark about Native Americans.
